text:
Thought provoking question for you all:
>*What experience at school has been most useful for career decision making?*

_Except this Prospela E-Mentoring which would of course be no. 1_ :laughing:.

'''There's no right or wrong answer. It can be anything from an inspirational speech from an employer to a motivational teacher to a vision you had whilst staring into your soup at lunch:ramen:'''
